Negro leaders, the Southern Regional Council was born,
The Council’s role has necessariiy changed over the
years as the situation has changed. From those days
when Negroes were pretty generally disfranchised,
WITHOUT POLITICAL OR MUCH ECONOMIC POWER, IN THE EARLY
TWENTIES. iE’VE NOW COME TO THE POINT WHEN A SERIES

A VARIETY OF TECHNIQUES, STAFF METHODS, HAS TRIED TO

THE MAJOR TRANSITION THAT THE SOUTH IS UNDERGOING IN
REDEFINING EQUALLY THE RIGHTS OF ALL CITIZENS.
